event.description: {CovLStrv2{{t{The expression {0} does not accomplish anything because it evaluates to either of its identical operands, {1}.}{{code{true /* !0 */ || true /* !0 */}}}{{code{true /* !0 */}}}}}}
{CovLStrv2{{t{Did you intend the operands to be different?}}}}

typePropertiesGroup.localEffect: This is often the result of a copy and paste error. It may result in the operator always evaluating to the same result.
typePropertiesGroup.longDescription: The same expression occurs on both sides of an operator.
